verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4438"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Roboam \w was|strong="H1961"\w* strengthened \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fortified, \w he|strong="H3068"\w* forsook \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2549"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* reign \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Roboam, Sesac \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* (\w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* sinned \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*)

\w With|strong="H5973"\w* twelve \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w chariots|strong="H7393"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* threescore \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w horsemen|strong="H6571"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w without|strong="H0369"\w* \w number|strong="H4557"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H0935"\w* \w of|strong="H4557"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w to|strong="H0935"\w* wit, \w Libyans|strong="H3864"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* Troglodites, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w Ethiopians|strong="H3569"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w took|strong="H3920"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* strongest \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* Juda, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* Semeias \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Roboam, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Juda, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* \w together|strong="H0622"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, fleeing \w from|strong="H0935"\w* Sesac, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Thus|strong="H3541"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w You|strong="H0859"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* \w you|strong="H0859"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Sesac.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, being \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* consternation, \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w just|strong="H6662"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w humbled|strong="H3665"\w*, \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Semeias, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w humbled|strong="H3665"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* help, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w fall|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Sesac.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0776"\w* \w serve|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H3045"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* difference between \w my|strong="H1961"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w service|strong="H5656"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* Sesac \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* departed \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w taking|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingâ€™s|strong="H4428"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w shields|strong="H4043"\w* \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w*,

\w Instead|strong="H8478"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w which|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* brazen ones, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w delivered|strong="H3027"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* shieldbearers, \w who|strong="H8104"\w* \w guarded|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w entrance|strong="H6607"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H0413"\w* shieldbearers \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w took|strong="H5375"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* armoury.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w yet|strong="H1571"\w* \w because|strong="H4480"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w humbled|strong="H3665"\w*, \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w wrath|strong="H0639"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* utterly \w destroyed|strong="H7843"\w*: \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w even|strong="H1571"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* Juda \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w found|strong="H1571"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* works.

\w King|strong="H4428"\w* Roboam \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w*: \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* began \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w seventeen|strong="H6240"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* \w out|strong="H2388"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w establish|strong="H7760"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*: \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* Naama \w an|strong="H7760"\w* \w Ammonitess|strong="H5985"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w prepare|strong="H3559"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w seek|strong="H1875"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w acts|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Roboam \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w last|strong="H0314"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w written|strong="H3789"\w* \w in|strong="H3789"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* books \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Semeias \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Addo \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seer|strong="H2374"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* diligently \w recorded|strong="H3789"\w*: \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w there|strong="H1992"\w* \w was|strong="H1697"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w between|strong="H4421"\w* Roboam \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Roboam \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* \w in|strong="H6912"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* Abia \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H6912"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w stead|strong="H8478"\w*.
